title.en: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha - Mahou Shoujo Tsumechaimashita (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: (C83) 魔法少女つめちゃいました

altTitles.en: A Magical Girl Has Come of Age!?
A Magical Girl's First Love Story
A Magical Girl and "The Plan for a Cheerful Family"
A Magical Girl's Valentine's Day Kiss

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahou Shoujo no Sweet Love Panic

altTitles.en: A Magical Girl's Sweet LOVE Panic

description.en:
### Mahou Shoujo Tsumechaimashita

Mekimeki Oukoku's Nanoha yuri doujins collected into a single book.

1. New Material Part 1  
2. Mahou Shoujo wa Otoshigoro (A Magical Girl Has Come of Age!?)  
3. A Magical Girl's Lovey-dovey Collection  
4. A Magical Girl's First Love Story  
5. Mahou Shoujo no Yume Biyori (A Magical Girl's Dreamy Days)  
6. A Magical Girl and "The Plan for a Cheerful Family"  
7. A Magical Girl's Family Circumstances  
8. A Magical Girl's Lyrical Anniversary  
9. A Magical Girl's Valentine's Day Kiss  
10. A Magical Girl's SEASIDE STORY!  
11. Nanoha Party 3 - Freely Distributed Book  
12. A Magical Girl's Sweet LOVE Panic  
The people close to the Takamachi family notice a sudden gain in weight that Fate and Vivio are getting lately, and probably you are imagining already who we can blame for this.
13. New Material Part 2

biography.en:
Doujin circle specializing in GL parody works.

**Native name**: めきめき王国

**Members**: 
[Mekimeki](https://mangadex.org/author/2a155603-7d75-4959-8146-005d8c9559e7) (duo)

Mekimeki (めきめき) is a Japanese manga artist duo that consists of Kurashiki (倉式; also known as Kagekatsu, 景勝) and Teruko (てる子; also known as Tsunpun, つんぷん). Kurashiki Teruko (倉式てる子) is an alias for this duo which combines the names of both artists.

**Native name**: めきめき

**Circle(s)**: [Mekimeki Oukoku](https://mangadex.org/author/04fcf56b-14bd-40b4-9f71-7fbcf18b8871) (めきめき王国), [Mekimekitei](https://mangadex.org/author/98d56534-5cd4-4a66-86a7-1c74d78997ab) (めきめき亭)

**Alt. names**:
Meki Meki
Kagekatsu
Kagekatu
Kurashiki
Kurashiki Teruko
Teruko
Tsunpun
